pages.text: The Mana Tap is a curious device, unique to this plane, that allows one to tap into the world's leylines and condense $(l:mana)mana$(/l) down into a tangible, physical form.$(br2)When placed down, it will begin automatically extracting $(l:mana)mana$(/l). What $(l:mana)mana$(/l) it can generate depends on the biome in which it is placed.
if it produces green mana, it's also a treetap
